page.title: 14Recreation.
page.content:
Leisure Activities.
Sometimes on Sundays during the light evenings we go to Whitley Bay. We buy some chips and an ice-cream and look at the ships passing by. When we have eaten our chips we get in the car and count how many different car registrations we can see on the way back. On Sundays if it is a nice day we go out to Hexham Green. We often see ducks and fish jumping out of the water. We often find golf balls lying about in the grass. On Saturdays my grandparents Michael and I go to Bywell. When we get to the river we see Mallard ducks and little fish. I once saw a kestrel and a stoat and herons flying over. My friend Paul and I go for walk with a snack. We see rabbits and pheasants.
